item.Q:
Write the character:
1: part
2: to divide; minute; (a measure word); (a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter)
item.A:
1: fèn 2: fēn
部分 bùfèn part; share; section; piece 分子 fēnzǐ molecule; (math) numerator of a fraction

item.Q:
Write the character:
(look) like; similar (to); appearance; to appear; to seem; image; portrait; resemble; seem
item.A:
xiàng
好像 hǎoxiàng as if; to seem like

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: chief; head; elder; to grow; to develop
2: length; long; forever; always; constantly
item.A:
traditional: 長
1: zhǎng 2: cháng
生长 (生長) shēngzhǎng grow 长期 (長期) chángqī long term; long time

shǒu
手段 shǒuduàn method; mean (of doing sth)

item.Q:
Write the character:
next in sequence; second; the second (day, time etc); secondary; vice-; sub-; infra-; inferior quality; substandard; order; sequence; hypo- (chem., meaning extra oxygen atom); times (classifier for enumerated events)
item.A:
cì
一次 yīcì first; first time; once; (math.) linear (of degree one)

item.Q:
Write the character:
already; to stop; then; afterwards
item.A:
yǐ
已经 (已經) yǐjīng already

item.Q:
Write the character:
clear; bright; to understand; next; the Ming dynasty (1368- 1644); surname
item.A:
míng
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

item.Q:
Write the character: fèn
(bùfèn de fèn)
item.A:
part
部分 bùfèn part; share; section; piece

item.Q:
Write the character: fēn
(fēnzǐ de fēn)
item.A:
to divide; minute; (a measure word); (a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter)
分子 fēnzǐ molecule; (math) numerator of a fraction

item.Q:
Write the character: xiàng
(hǎoxiàng de xiàng)
item.A:
(look) like; similar (to); appearance; to appear; to seem; image; portrait; resemble; seem
好像 hǎoxiàng as if; to seem like

item.Q:
Write the character: zhǎng
(shēngzhǎng de zhǎng)
item.A:
traditional: 長
chief; head; elder; to grow; to develop
生长 (生長) shēngzhǎng grow

item.Q:
Write the character: cháng
(chángqī de cháng)
item.A:
traditional: 長
length; long; forever; always; constantly
长期 (長期) chángqī long term; long time

item.Q:
Write the character: shǒu
(shǒuduàn de shǒu)
item.A:
hand; convenient
手段 shǒuduàn method; mean (of doing sth)

item.Q:
Write the character: cì
(yīcì de cì)
item.A:
next in sequence; second; the second (day, time etc); secondary; vice-; sub-; infra-; inferior quality; substandard; order; sequence; hypo- (chem., meaning extra oxygen atom); times (classifier for enumerated events)
一次 yīcì first; first time; once; (math.) linear (of degree one)

item.Q:
Write the character: yǐ
(yǐjīng de yǐ)
item.A:
already; to stop; then; afterwards
已经 (已經) yǐjīng already

item.Q:
Write the character: míng
(shuōmíng de míng)
item.A:
clear; bright; to understand; next; the Ming dynasty (1368- 1644); surname Ming
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption
bùfēn not divided; irrespective
fēnzhī (indicating a fraction)
fēnzǐ molecule; (math) numerator of a fraction
fēnjīa to separate and live apart; division of a large family into smaller groups
fēngōng divide the work; division of labor
fēnxīn to distract

traditional: 分會
fēnhuì branch
fēnqīng to distinguish (between different things); to make distinctions clear

traditional: 分發
fēnfā distribute; distribution
fēnxíng branch

traditional: 分說
fēnshuō to explain (the difference)

traditional: 分開
fēnkāi to separate; to part

traditional: 分點
fēndiǎn point of division
míngfèn a person's status
dàfēnzǐ (chem.) macromolecule

traditional: 學分
xuéfēn course credit
défēn to score
chéngfèn ingredient

běnfèn (to play) one's part; one's role; one's duty; (to stay within) one's bounds
běnfēn devoir
bǐfēn score

traditional: 過分
guòfèn excessive; undue; overly
gāofēnzǐ macromolecule; polymer
hǎoxiàng as if; to seem like
xiǎngxiàng imagine; visualize

traditional: 多長
duōcháng how long

traditional: 天長
Tiāncháng (N) Tianchang (city in Anhui)
tiāncháng Tianchang

traditional: 家長
jīazhǎng the parent or guardian of a child

traditional: 工長
gōngzhǎng gangmaster

traditional: 年長
niánzhǎng senior

traditional: 成長
chéngzhǎng to mature; to grow; growth

traditional: 所長
suǒzhǎng head of an institute etc

traditional: 生長
shēngzhǎng grow

traditional: 科長
kēzhǎng section chief

traditional: 站長
zhànzhǎng stationmaster

traditional: 長城
chángchéng the Great Wall

traditional: 長大
zhǎngdà to grow up

traditional: 長子
Zhǎngzǐ (N) Zhangzi (place in Shanxi)
chángzǐ eldest child
zhǎngzǐ eldest son

traditional: 長年
chángnián all the year round

traditional: 長於
chángyú to excel at

traditional: 長生
chángshēng perdure
yīshǒu a skill; mastery of a trade; by oneself; without outside help
xìashǒu start; put one's hand to; set about; the seat to the right of the main guest
rénshǒu manpower
chūshǒu to raise hands
fēnshǒu split up; break up

traditional: 動手
dòngshǒu to hit with hands or fists; to start work; to touch
hǎoshǒu expert

traditional: 對手
duìshǒu opponent; adversary; match
shǒuxìa leadership; under one's control or administration; subordinates; to take action; to run out of money
shǒugōng handwork; manual
shǒufǎ technique; trick; skill
xīnshǒu new hand; novice; raw recruit
néngshǒu expert
gāoshǒu expert; a past master; a dab hand
yīcì first; first time; once; (math.) linear (of degree one)
shàngcì last time
xìacì next time
réncì person-times; visits; classifier for number of people participating
wèicì place (in numbered sequence); degree on employment scale
qícì next; secondly
zàicì one more time; again; one more; once again
míngcì position in a ranking of names
duōcì many times; repeatedly
cìzhī second (in a competition); occupying second place
cìzǐ second son

traditional: 次於
cìyú second to
cìrì next day; the morrow
cìshēng derivative; secondary; sub-
cìyào secondary

traditional: 次長
cìcháng vice director
cìzhǎng deputy chief
bùyǐ endlessly; incessantly
bùdéyǐ act against one's will; have no alternative but to; have to; to have no choice; must

traditional: 已經
yǐjīng already
éryǐ that's all; nothing more
bùmíng not clear; unknown; fail to understand
fēnmíng clearly demarcated; sharply contoured
tiānmíng dawn, early morning (lit., when the sky gets bright)
wénmíng civilized; civilization; culture
míngtiān tomorrow
míngnián next year
míngwén to state in writing (laws, rules etc)
míngrì tomorrow
míngmíng obviously; plainly; undoubtedly
Qīngmíng Qingming or Pure Brightness, 5th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气, from 6th April; the Qingming festival (Pure brightness or tomb-sweeping), 4th-6th April

traditional: 發明
fāmíng to invent; invention

traditional: 說明
shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

traditional: 開明
kāimíng enlightened; open-minded; enlightenment
gāomíng smart; clever; wise; brilliant
